Trade/Device Name(s): Simplexa Bordetella Positive Control Pack MOL2760
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Simplexa Bordetella Direct qualitative real-time PCR assay for detection and differentiation of Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis in nasopharyngeal specimens on the LIAISON MDX instrument
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis nucleic acids from frozen nasopharyngeal specimens from patients with signs and symptoms of Bordetella infection of the respiratory tract, used as an aid in diagnosis in conjunction with other clinical and epidemiological information
